health-data.title: My Health Data
health-data.text: Enter your blood pressure, heart rate and body weight and evaluate your data as tables and charts.

bmi.label: BMI
bmi.footnote: In order to see your Body Mass Index (BMI), please enter your size your user profile.

not-found.title: Page not found!

access-denied.text: You are not allowed to visit this page. You might have to sign in first.

no-data: You don't have any data in this section.

delete.title: Delete?

home.text: Enter and view your health data: blood pressure, heart rate and body weight!
home.title: My Health
